game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken, fragments of different eras have merged to form a realm known as Timestream. Players take on the role of a Chronomancer, tasked with finding and repairing the timestream's fractures.
game.beginning: The game begins in the present day, where players are introduced to their mentor, a wise old Chronomancer who has gone missing. The player discovers a mysterious device that allows them to traverse time and space, seeking out fragments of different eras.
game.ending: As players journey through Timestream, they will encounter ancient civilizations, futuristic cities, and mythological creatures. Their ultimate goal is to repair the timestream's fractures, restoring balance to the fabric of reality.
